definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The Canadian city hosted the Winter Olympics last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年加拿大的城市舉辦了冬奧會。

sentences.english: Skiing, ice-skating and ice hockey are among the 7 Winter Game sports.
sentences.chinese: 冬奧會舉辦了7屆，有滑雪，滑冰和冰上曲棍球。

sentences.english: Noted as a resort, it was the site of the 1936 Winter Olympics. Population, 28,049.
sentences.chinese: 作爲旅遊勝地而著名，1936年冬奧會於此舉行。

sentences.english: The Winter Olympics came after the Summer Olympics, right?
sentences.chinese: 冬奧會比夏季奧運會出現得晚是吧？

sentences.english: The 1964 Winter Olympics in Innsbruck were threatened by a lack of snow.
sentences.chinese: 1964年因斯布魯克冬奧會曾經面臨缺雪的威脅。

sentences.english: The first Winter Olympics were held in Chamonix, France in 1924.
sentences.chinese: 1924年，第一屆冬奧會在法國夏蒙尼市舉行。

sentences.english: Russia unveiled its mascots for the 2014 Winter Olympics on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 上週六，索契冬奧會吉祥物經俄羅斯全國投票決出。

sentences.english: It is expected to be ready in time for the 2014 Winter Olympics in nearby Sochi.
sentences.chinese: 預計它將在毗鄰的索契舉辦2014年冬奧會前建成。

sentences.english: That is why they are called the Winter Olympics. ( P. 10 )
sentences.chinese: 那就是它們爲什麼被稱爲冬奧會。

sentences.english: Georgia's president Mikhail Saakashvili has already hinted at a boycott.
sentences.chinese: 格魯吉亞總統薩卡什維利已經暗示要杯葛冬奧會。

sentences.english: By bidding for the Olympics, Vancouver invited the world to visit.
sentences.chinese: 溫哥華通過申請冬奧會，邀請全世界來溫哥華。

sentences.english: The 2010 Winter Olympics helped showcase the city to the world.
sentences.chinese: 而2010年的冬奧會則向世界展示了這座城市。

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
abbr. for 全國運動會|全国运动会[Quan2 guo2 Yun4 dong4 hui4]
the right to host (an international meeting)
abbr. for 國際足球聯合會|国际足球联合会, FIFA, international federation of football associations
